work with somebody or in an environment
that will really teach you what good

understanding of the patterns that exist

but and there's an important part here

those learnings are very important when
I think about how I've gone on to
succeed or manage things in the future
really understand what it is that you
want to achieve at the beginning of my
career I only found out probably
afterwards what I was supposed to have
done in that job it is critically
important for every step that you take
to really realize what this next two or
three years is all about so my advice to
anyone starting a business is to employ
good engineers and scientists and to
trust them listen to their ideas and
believe in them and back them
